title: Hydrological Model - TSGage
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic gage (time series object) for Hydrologic Simulation model.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be TSGage

description.description: Optional text with important information about the basin

timeStep.description: The timestep of the time series. Number. All units are accepted

startDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The start date and time of the time series. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval

endDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The end date and time of the time series. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval

data.description: An array providing the timeseries values

timestamps.description: An array providing the timeseries values in ISO8601 UTCformat.
